title: CHOFFEE – Instant Chickpea Coffee Alternative
description:
This packaging design was created for CHOFFEE, an innovative chickpea-based coffee alternative targeting health-conscious consumers seeking a caffeine-free option. The project involved designing a visually appealing and informative pouch that could stand out on retail shelves while reflecting the warmth and comfort associated with a traditional coffee experience.

The design features a smooth gradient of warm hues and a subtle geometric pattern to convey both natural simplicity and premium quality. A realistic cup of the brewed product is showcased alongside chickpeas to clearly communicate the core ingredient. Key product benefits and preparation instructions are thoughtfully placed to ensure clarity for first-time buyers.

This mockup was developed to visualize the final product for marketing and presentation purposes. The concept balances modern branding with a clean, functional layout — ready for both print and digital use.

title: NutriGout Plus – Supplement Bottle Design
description:
NutriGout Plus is a dietary supplement created to support individuals managing gout-related issues. The goal of this packaging design was to communicate trust, cleanliness, and clinical quality while staying true to the health supplement market.

The clean white bottle background emphasizes purity and safety, while the green tones reflect natural ingredients and wellness. The branding combines medical professionalism (through the cross icon and structured font) with subtle organic cues (via the foot icon and soft green palette). Important product details like "750 mg," "GMP Certified," and "Made in the USA" are prominently placed to reinforce credibility and transparency for consumers.

This 60-capsule vegetarian supplement bottle mockup is ideal for digital marketing, online store listings, and investor presentations.

title: ClearMed™ Hemorrhoid Treatment – Supplement Label
description:
This project features the complete packaging and product visualization for ClearMed™ Hemorrhoid Treatment, a dietary supplement aimed at relief and prevention of hemorrhoids. The product is presented in two variants: Mild Strength (45 capsules) and Extra Strength (90 capsules).

The design goal was to create a clean, clinical, and trustworthy aesthetic while using color and layout to clearly distinguish product strength and instructions. The branding utilizes calming tones of purple and magenta, symbolizing both care and wellness. Each label is optimized for FDA-compliant supplement packaging, including Supplement Facts, dosage directions, cautions, and contact information.

For visual storytelling, a series of realistic mockups were created featuring front, angled, and side views. These mockups showcase the bottle in soft studio lighting and pastel-toned environments to highlight the professionalism and clarity of the design. The layout is designed to stand out both in retail settings and on digital platforms.

This work demonstrates my ability to design effective health supplement packaging from concept to final visualization, suitable for both online listings and investor presentations.

title: Seb’s Meds – Premium Wellness Tincture Label Series
description:
This project showcases a cohesive and professionally designed label system for Seb’s Meds, a line of cannabinoid-infused wellness tinctures aimed at supporting energy, focus, sleep, relaxation, and emergency needs. The visual system combines clean typography, color-coded accents, and symbolic graphics to differentiate each product while maintaining brand unity. Key features include:

Brand Logo Design: Featuring a cannabis leaf inside a droplet, presented in both green and white variants for light/dark versatility.

Label Series (30ml & 60ml):

Power Up – Boost productivity with 600mgCBD, 600mgCBG, and 300mgCBGa.

Daily Driver – Everyday balance with 720mgCBD, 540mgCBGa, and 180mgCBG.

I.C.O.E (In Case of Emergency) – High potency 1000mg Delta8 THC.

Chill Pill – Calm and relax with 630mgCBD, 630mgCBDA, and 210mgCBGa/ml.

Doze Dose – Nighttime formula with 720mgCBD, 540mgCBN, and 180mgCBNO.

Don’t Puke Just Rally – Anti-nausea support with 900mgCBDA and 300mgCBD.

Design Language: Dark, minimalist aesthetic with contrastive white and neon green type for clarity and brand identity.

Typography & Layout: Bold product names, functional descriptors, and clear cannabinoid ratios for transparency and compliance.

This product identity system ensures shelf appeal, consumer trust, and strong product segmentation for Seb’s Meds across retail and eCommerce platforms.
